title: A turf war over public lands
itunes:title: A turf war over public lands
description: President Trump waded into a decades old battle over federal public lands when he announced he was drastically scaling back two national monuments created by Presidents Clinton and Obama. We explore the future of public lands and the Antiquities Act.
itunes:summary: President Trump waded into a decades old battle over federal public lands when he announced he was drastically scaling back two national monuments created by Presidents Clinton and Obama. We explore the future of public lands and the Antiquities Act.
media:description: President Trump waded into a decades old battle over federal public lands when he announced he was drastically scaling back two national monuments created by Presidents Clinton and Obama.
author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW)
itunes:author: KCRW
itunes:keywords: national monument,Bears Ears,Native American,Antiquities Act,Grand Staircase Escalante,President Trump,Alabama Senate race,Doug Jones,Roy Moore,Steve Bannon,partisan politics
